targets.query: SELECT last("steps") FROM "movement_metrics" WHERE "type" = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierStepCount' AND time >= now() - 1d
SELECT last("active_energy") FROM "energy_metrics" WHERE "type" = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierActiveEnergyBurned' AND time >= now() - 1d
SELECT last("stand_time") FROM "energy_metrics" WHERE "type" = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierAppleStandTime' AND time >= now() - 1d
SELECT last("exercise_time") FROM "energy_metrics" WHERE "type" = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierAppleExerciseTime' AND time >= now() - 1d
SELECT last("resting_heart_rate") FROM "heart_metrics" WHERE "type" = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierRestingHeartRate' AND time >= now() - 7d
SELECT last("hrv_sdnn") FROM "heart_metrics" WHERE "type" = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierHeartRateVariabilitySDNN' AND time >= now() - 7d

SELECT sum("duration")/3600 as "Sleep Hours" 
FROM "sleep_metrics" 
WHERE time >= now() - 1d
SELECT mean("oxygen_saturation") FROM "respiratory_metrics" WHERE "type" = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierOxygenSaturation' AND time >= now() - 1d
SELECT mean("heart_rate") AS "Heart Rate" FROM "heart_metrics" WHERE $timeFilter AND "type" = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierHeartRate' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("hrv_sdnn") * 1.2 * 0.4 as "HRV Component"
  FROM "heart_metrics"
  WHERE "type" = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierHeartRateVariabilitySDNN' AND time >= now() - 7d

SELECT (100 - mean("resting_heart_rate")) * 0.3 as "RHR Component"
  FROM "heart_metrics"
  WHERE "type" = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierRestingHeartRate' AND time >= now() - 7d

SELECT sum("duration")/3600 * 12.5 * 0.3 as "Sleep Component"
FROM "sleep_metrics"
WHERE "type" = 'HKCategoryTypeIdentifierSleepAnalysis' AND time >= now() - 7d

SELECT 
                    (acute_load / chronic_load) as "ACWR"
                FROM (
                    SELECT 
                        mean("duration") * mean("value") as acute_load
                    FROM "workout_sessions" 
                    WHERE time >= now() - 7d
                ),
                (
                    SELECT 
                        mean("duration") * mean("value") as chronic_load
                    FROM "workout_sessions" 
                    WHERE time >= now() - 28d
                )
SELECT sum("exercise_time") as "Exercise Minutes" FROM "energy_metrics" WHERE "type" = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierAppleExerciseTime' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)

SELECT mean("duration")*mean("total_energy_burned")/1000 as "Acute Load (7d)" FROM "workout_sessions" WHERE $timeFilter
GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)
SELECT mean("vo2_max") as "VO₂ Max" FROM "fitness_metrics" WHERE "type" = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierVO2Max' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(7d) fill(null)

SELECT sum("duration")/60 as "Total Sleep" 
FROM "sleep_metrics" 
WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)

SELECT mean("value") as "Sleep State" 
FROM "sleep_metrics" 
WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30m) fill(null)
SELECT mean("hrv_sdnn") as "HRV SDNN" FROM "heart_metrics" WHERE "type" = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierHeartRateVariabilitySDNN' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("resting_heart_rate") as "Resting HR" FROM "heart_metrics" WHERE "type" = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierRestingHeartRate' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT "value" as "1-Min Recovery" FROM "heart_metrics" WHERE "type" = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierHeartRateRecoveryOneMinute' AND $timeFilter
SELECT mean("resting_heart_rate") as "Resting HR" FROM "heart_metrics" WHERE "type" = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierRestingHeartRate' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT mean("oxygen_saturation") as "SpO₂ Average" FROM "respiratory_metrics" WHERE "type" = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierOxygenSaturation' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT min("oxygen_saturation") as "SpO₂ Minimum" FROM "respiratory_metrics" WHERE "type" = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierOxygenSaturation' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT mean("respiratory_rate") as "Respiratory Rate" FROM "respiratory_metrics" WHERE "type" = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierRespiratoryRate' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT (100 - (mean("hrv_sdnn") / mean("heart_rate") * 100)) as "Stress Index" FROM "heart_metrics" WHERE $timeFilter AND ("type" = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierHeartRateVariabilitySDNN' OR "type" = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierHeartRate') GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT last("hrv_sdnn") * 1.2 as "HRV Score" FROM "heart_metrics" WHERE "type" = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierHeartRateVariabilitySDNN' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d)
SELECT (100 - last("resting_heart_rate")) as "RHR Score" FROM "heart_metrics" WHERE "type" = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierRestingHeartRate' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d)
SELECT (sum("duration")/60 * 12.5) as "Sleep Score" FROM "sleep_metrics" WHERE "type" = 'HKCategoryTypeIdentifierSleepAnalysis' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d)

SELECT 
(COUNT("heart_rate") * 100.0 / 1440) as "heart_metrics",
(COUNT("steps") * 100.0 / 1440) as "movement_metrics",
(COUNT("duration") * 100.0 / 24) as "sleep_metrics"
FROM "heart_metrics", "movement_metrics", "sleep_metrics"
WHERE $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time(1h) fill(0)
SELECT last(time) as "Last Data Point" FROM "heart_metrics"

SELECT time, "heart_rate",
ABS("heart_rate" - 70) / 20 as "HR Z-Score Approx"
FROM "heart_metrics"
WHERE "type" = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierHeartRate'
AND $timeFilter
AND ("heart_rate" < 30 OR "heart_rate" > 200)

SELECT
      COUNT(*) as "Records",
      min(time) as "First Record",
      max(time) as "Last Record"
  FROM "heart_metrics"

SELECT
      COUNT(*) as "Records",
      min(time) as "First Record",
      max(time) as "Last Record"
  FROM "movement_metrics"

SELECT
      COUNT(*) as "Records",
      min(time) as "First Record",
      max(time) as "Last Record"
  FROM "sleep_metrics"
